name: Caveman Bob and the Inevitable Dawn
name_original: Caveman Bob and the Inevitable Dawn
description:
A short single-screen platformer about killing mosquitoes, made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50, with the theme "Delay the Inevitable".

Please enable fullscreen (by clicking on the little icon in the lower-right corner of the game display) for a better experience.

Also, if the controls aren't working, please try clicking on the game to focus it.

Made with macroquad and hecs.
